comment.name: AntdActionSheet
comment.title: 动作面板
comment.description: 从底部弹出的动作菜单面板。
comment.usage: 由用户操作触发，提供一组与当前场景操作相关的两个或多个选项，让用户在不离场的情况下完成操作。

properties.name: styleBuilder
properties.funcSig: AntdActionSheetStyle Function(BuildContext context, AntdActionSheet widget, AntdActionSheetStyle defaultStyle, AntdMapToken token)

properties.name: onMaskTap
properties.description: 点击蒙层自身触发,mask为true才有效

properties.name: dismissOnMaskTap
properties.description: 点击背景板是否关闭,mask为true才有效

properties.name: cancelText
properties.description: 取消按钮文字，如果设置为空则不显示取消按钮

properties.name: onAction
properties.description: 点击选项时触发，禁用或加载状态下不会触发

demos.name: AntdActionSheetDemo
demos.title: 基础用法

demos.name: AntdActionSheetCancelExtraDemo
demos.title: 取消和额外描述

demos.name: AntdActionSheetDisableDanderDemo
demos.title: 禁用和危险的选项

demos.name: AntdActionSheetEventDemo
demos.title: 事件

demos.name: AntdActionSheetWaitDemo
demos.title: 等待弹窗结束

properties.name: styleBuilder
properties.funcSig: AntdActionStyle Function(BuildContext context, AntdSheetAction widget, AntdActionStyle defaultStyle, AntdMapToken token)

properties.name: onTap
properties.description: 点击时触发,单独使用无效

properties.name: inherit
properties.description: 是否继承样式,如果为false则不会向上合并其他的样式
